results.title: A Case Report on Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis and Transient Blindness
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ should be discontinued in all cases of @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@MALA@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@vision loss@@@.

results.title: Reversible Total Vision Loss Caused by Severe Metformin-associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report
results.text_hl: We present a case of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ whose serum @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ concentration was unusually high and associated with @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@vision loss@@@.

citations.NLM: Koons A, Amaducci AM, Katz KD. Reversible Total Vision Loss Caused by Severe Metformin-associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report Clin Pract Cases Emerg Med. 2021 May;5(2):206-209. PMID: 34437006

results.title: Metformin may alter the course of Leber's hereditary optic neuropathy: a case report.
results.text_hl: In this study, we report the case of a 48-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ diagnosed with @DISEASE_Optic_Atrophy_Hereditary_Leber @DISEASE_MESH:D029242 @@@LHON@@@ (m.11778G>A/MT-ND4) and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ who experienced visual field improvement following @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment after 26 months of progressive @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@vision loss@@@ unresponsive to @CHEMICAL_idebenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C036619 @@@idebenone@@@, @CHEMICAL_NAD @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009243 @@@nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide@@@ (@CHEMICAL_NAD @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009243 @@@NAD+@@@), and hormone replacement therapy (HRT).

citations.NLM: Elmaseh SA, Gauthier DA, Golmohammadi M, Pargalava N, Carelli V, Sadun AA. Metformin may alter the course of Leber's hereditary optic neuropathy: a case report. Front Med (Lausanne). 2025;12():1609941. PMID: 40904364

results.title: Nonadherence and Contributing Factors among Ambulatory Patients with Antidiabetic Medications in Adama Referral Hospital
results.text_hl: Common comorbid conditions include @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, 148 (54.82%), and @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@visual impairment@@@, 89 (32.96%).

results.title: Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes.
results.text_hl: There was no clear evidence of difference in postnatal weight retention between @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ treated with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and those treated with oral anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ pharmacological therapy (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@) at six to eight weeks postpartum (MD -1.60 kg, 95% CI -6.34 to 3.14; one study, 167 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; low-quality evidence) or one year postpartum (MD -3.70, 95% CI -8.50 to 1.10; one study, 176 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; low-quality evidence).

citations.NLM: Brown J, Grzeskowiak L, Williamson K, Downie MR, Crowther CA. Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2017 Nov 5;11(11):CD012037. PMID: 29103210
citations.BibTeX: @article{29103210, title={Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes.}, author={Brown J and Grzeskowiak L and Williamson K and Downie MR and Crowther CA}, journal={Cochrane Database Syst Rev}, volume={11}, number={11}, pages={CD012037}}

results.title: Alpha-glucosidase inhibitors for prevention or delay of type 2 diabetes mellitus and its associated complications in people at increased risk of developing type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: One trial with 90 @SPECIES_9606 @@@participants@@@ compared @CHEMICAL_Acarbose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020909 @@@acarbose@@@ with diet and exercise and another trial with 98 @SPECIES_9606 @@@participants@@@ reported data on @CHEMICAL_Acarbose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020909 @@@acarbose@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. There were no clear differences for any outcome measure between these two @CHEMICAL_Acarbose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020909 @@@acarbose@@@ interventions and the associated comparator groups.None of the trials reported @DISEASE_Amputation_Congenital @DISEASE_MESH:C565682 @@@amputation of@@@ lower extremity, @DISEASE_Blindness @DISEASE_MESH:D001766 @@@blindness@@@ or severe @<m>DISEASE_Vision_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014786 @@@vision loss@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end-stage renal disease@@@, health-related quality of life, time to progression to @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@, or socioeconomic effects.

citations.NLM: Moelands SV, Lucassen PL, Akkermans RP, De Grauw WJ, Van de Laar FA. Alpha-glucosidase inhibitors for prevention or delay of type 2 diabetes mellitus and its associated complications in people at increased risk of developing type 2 diabetes mellitus. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2018 Dec 28;12(12):CD005061. PMID: 30592787
